data.eml:eml: A new species of Rhinophis Hemprich, 1820 (Serpentes: Uropeltidae) from the central hills of Sri Lanka

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mendis Wickramasinghe, L. J., Vidanapathirana, Dulan Ranga, Gehan Rajeev, M. D., Gower, David J. (2017): A new species of Rhinophis Hemprich, 1820 (Serpentes: Uropeltidae) from the central hills of Sri Lanka. Zootaxa 4263 (1): 153-164, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4263.1.7
